author: bodewig
msg: Ant will now scan for build.xml in the parent directory (directories)
Added -debug and Project.MSG_DEBUG to make -verbose less verbose. Many
messages really rather belong into a DEBUG category.

author: bodewig
msg: Put the PATH obtained from extdirs between bootclasspath and
userclasspath when using jikes or jvc to make them match javac's

author: bodewig
msg: Only set location in BuildException if the task didn't provide it
This will give the correct location for errors in build files invoked

author: bodewig
msg: Allow tasks to be added at runtime and only fail if they cannot be
